name: Block Game: Level 3
description:
Hello and welcome to my incredible block game. Yellow blocks are locked in place horizontally! My high score for this level: 15

How to Play:

Keep the white block in the target area (dark square) while removing as many gray (and yellow!) blocks as possible. 

Click gray or yellow blocks to remove. If the white block is still in the target area 5 seconds after clicking, 1 point is added to your score.

Any pending points remaining when the white block falls out of the area are forfeit. Any removeable blocks that fall off screen are added to your pending score. Good luck!
